message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. It's a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in this product, but I need to make sure it's a good deal for me.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $850,000 is a good starting point, I'm hoping we can find a price that's mutually beneficial. I'm willing to come down to $900,000. It's a fair price considering the value you place on this product and it still allows me to achieve my desired outcome.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875,000. I'm trying to get the best deal possible, but I'm also open to finding a mutually beneficial agreement.
